name: Gluten Free Penne with Puttanesca Sauce
author: Barilla
summary: A delicious gluten free variation of a simple, delicious Italian dish, this recipe pairs gluten free penne with olives, capers, red pepper flakes in a delicious tomato sauce.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) box Barilla Gluten Free Penne
½ teaspoon red pepper flakes, or to taste
1 cup kalamata olives, pitted and halved
1 (28 ounce) can Italian peeled tomatoes, crushed
directions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil
Meanwhile saute garlic, chili flakes and anchovies in olive oil for 1-2 minutes or until garlic is slightly yellow in color
Add the tomatoes, olives and capers, bring to a simmer
Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to package directions, drain and toss with sauce
